alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade County through 145 PM MDT... At 103 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tilford, or 7 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Meade County near and east of Tilford. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 37 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
